text: "Rock and Roll Ain't Noise Pollution" is a 1980 song by Australian hard rock band AC/DC and taken from their seventh studio album Back in Black. It went to number 7 in Australia and number 15 in Ireland and the United Kingdom. ==Track listing== #"Rock and Roll Ain't Noise Pollution" – 4:12 #"Hells Bells" – 5:10 Category:1980 songs Category:AC/DC songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Blues rock songs
title: Rock and Roll Ain't Noise Pollution
